Interface DataProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataInputProvider, DataOutputProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CommonDataProvider, CsvDataProvider, DBDataProvider, ExcelDataProvider, InputExcelDataProvider, InputGherkinDataProvider, OutputConsoleDataProvider, OutputExcelDataProvider, RestDataProvider

      • getModel

        Class<Model> getModel(String modelPackagesCsv)
               throws TechnicalException
        Parameters:
        modelPackagesCsv - The list of available package in which to search for a valid Model (in CSV format with ; separator).
        Returns:
        An instance of Class that can be mapped with ExcelDataProvider data.
        Throws:
        TechnicalException - if Wrong data file (IOException, EmptyDataFileContentException or WrongDataFileFormatException)

      • isResultColumnNameAuthorized

        boolean isResultColumnNameAuthorized(String name)
        Returns true if the given column name is part of authorized column names. See CommonDataProvider.ResultColumnNames class.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to check
        Returns:
        true if the name is authorized, false otherwise
